name: Walled Apart
description:
A short puzzle game where two lil' guys help each other escape a dungeon by blocking deadly lasers and crossing cold rivers. 

Can you help them in their escape?

Objective: Get both characters to their flags

Controls:

Move: W A S D

Change direction: Space + W A S D 

Place/Pickup: E

Change player: Left shift

Restart: R

Menu: Esc

Place a box on the teleporter to teleport the box to the other side

Metal boxes stop lasers but sink in water

Wood boxes make bridges over water but are destroyed by lasers

This was made over 7 days for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1
